page.title: 13THE CHRISTMAS FAIR
page.content: The Bishops Itchington P.T.A.{ {Christmas Fair}held in the school hall in early December, is always a great success with parents and children. Could this be the lack of entry fee, or the brilliant stalls and games run by{teachers, parents}and{children?} The parents organise the raffle, spin the wheel and refreshments. The teachers organise games like cut the cards and a game called six dice. The children do games that they bring in like Connect 4 and arcade games. Mr. Wallace organises the school's{ {computers.} But the main attraction is {Santa Claus.}Even l7 year olds queue up to get presents for only 25p. The Christmas Fair opens at about 6.30 p.m. and closes around 9.00 p.m. About 200 people come to the fair and the school makes about Â£200 to pay for {school Xmas parties}for the{children.}
